title: can we all agree bard and ivern are literal dog shit
body:
absolutely 2 most useless champs in league 

I'd rather afk then play with one of those monkeys on my team

replies.body:
Bard is one of the hardest, yet most rewarding supports to play.

What are you smoking?

Just a shinier bronze, really.

In your elo these kinds of champions suck since the skill level's extremely low and they require quite a bit of strategical and mechanical skill.

Edit;
Oh, you actually got demoted to Bronze II

I rest my case

I've never been Bronze before.
Even when I started I got placed in Silver four

Now I'm in Diamond IV and can actually see some of the best Bards I've ever seen.
Really a blessing, watching them time their ult, stuns and journey's is a feast for the eyes

Kid your a new level of dumb. Why do you think people praise Aphromoos Bard? Why do you think QTpie loves when he gets a good bard or thresh? Because bard is one of the highest skill cap champs in this game, he is essentially the lee sin of supports. A bad bard will do essentially nothing, and do terrible ults and fuck up team fights for your team. A good bard will win team fights with his ult and his stun. Plain and simple. Im in Gold and i occasionally get to see some of these fantastic bards and I relish in the fact that this support makes my life so easy because as a {{champion:107}} main it is hilarious watching them get stunned to a wall or watch their front line get ulted so i get a free feast on the backline. Bronze players will never understand the power of a good bard without actually seeing a good bard.
